entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
